summary: Comprehensive testing of CertifyPro digital certificate system completed. Backend API achieved 100% success rate (13/13 tests passed). Frontend testing confirmed professional dark blue design, authentication flows, dashboard functionality, and public QR verification system working correctly.

resolved_issues.fix_applied: Fixed authentication dependency structure in server.py and auth.py

resolved_issues.issue: Certificate model required hash_code field during instantiation
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Made hash_code optional in Certificate model

integration_issues.issue: Session expiry correctly redirects to login (expected behavior)

passed_tests: Professional dark blue corporate design theme
